My web pages

A collection of webpages I design and manage. Each web was created from scratch and are developed with HTML, CSS, JAVASCRIPT as well as some bits of PHP. I develop the color schemes and also create graphics and logos to aline with the brands. I manage the Hosting and domains of some of my clients.

I also created this portfolio from scratch.

  • Ludoteca en la Nube
  • Terra Turca
  • Vindrogames

Ludoteca En la Nube

My personal domain dedicated to play and learning filled with bilingual activities for all ages. This is my passion project that unites my two worlds, Education and Programming.

With this web I explore advanced SASS and JAVASCRIPT to create interactive learning activities that work entirely on the front end.

Terra Turca

Madrid based company dedicated to import and distribution of Turkish food in Spain. My first official client, the business took off in 2023 and creating the web as a huge catalyst for the project.

A simple web designed to entice restaurants and catering services with traditional Turkish cuisine. Most of the web is HTML and SASS but includes bits of JQUERY and PHP.

Vindrogames

A playground for my spanish brother Fernando and I to learn programming with real challenges. We both love to play games and create games for learning while at the same time learning programming by creating games.

My very first web, We started this project back in 2020. In it's beginning only HTML and CSS inspired by courses with @TraversyMedia. As we continue to grow and learn the web is evolving as we restructure the code and explore new languages and frameworks.

Hero Section 100vh and display flex-column with centered container with display flex-row.

Container with display grid-template-columns 1fr with each web item a 100vh container with display flex-row.

This page is pure SASS and some jquery.
